title: nIlakaNThAya namO
sahitya:
nIlakaNThAya namO namastE nikhilAgama sannuta varAya nIrajAsanAdi pUjitAya


anupallavi

 pAlita dAsajana mukundAya pannagAbharaNa bhUSaNAya


caraNam   bAlArka shashi vahni nEtra dharAya bAla guruguha sEvitAya bAlakucAmbA sahavAsAya
bAla gIrvANa gIta nAdarAmakriyA mOditAya shrInAtha cidAnanda sahitAya dakSiNakAshI sthitAya
